plptool.mips

Class SimCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.PLPSimCore
      • plptool.mips.SimCore

  • public class SimCore
extends PLPSimCore
    mips.SimCore is the PLP CPU Architecture Simulator. This class contains core functionality of the simulator: the CPU itself, memory elements, pipeline registers, and I/O devices. Users can interact with the simulation core by using typical procedures such as stepping and I/O. It's up to the command line interface or the GUI to present these features to the user.

      This is the execute (EX) stage of the PLP CPU pipeline.
      class  SimCore.id
      This is the instruction decode (ID) / register file (RF) stage of the PLP CPU core.
      class  SimCore.mem
      This is the memory (MEM) stage of the PLP CPU pipeline.
      class  SimCore.wb
      This is the writeback (WB) and final stage of the PLP CPU pipeline.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimCore

        public SimCore(Asm asm,
               long startAddr)
        Simulator plp constructor.
        Parameters:
        RAMsize - the size of main memory attached to this core
        startAddr - the starting address of the main memory
        asm - assembler object passed on to this simulator
        See Also:
        PLPAsm

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public int reset()
        Reset the core: clears RAM and zeroes out register file, reloads the program to memory, resets program counter, flushes the pipeline, clears flags, and resets statistics.
        Specified by:
        reset in class PLPSimCore
        Returns:
        Returns 0 on successful completion. Should not fail.
        See Also:
        softreset()

      • softreset

        public int softreset()
        Reset the program counter and flushes the pipeline.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 on completion.
        See Also:
        reset()

      • loadProgram

        public int loadProgram(PLPAsm x)
        Part of the PLPSimCore specification, this function implements a program loading routine for the simulation core.
        Specified by:
        loadProgram in class PLPSimCore
        Parameters:
        x - assembler object containing the program code
        Returns:
        PLP_OK on completion, error code otherwise

      • step

        public int step()
        Advance the simulation by one cycle.
        Specified by:
        step in class PLPSimCore
        Returns:
        Returns 0 on successful completion. Error code otherwise.

      • stepFunctional

        public int stepFunctional()
        Non-cycle accurate stepping. One instruction is fetched and executed every cycle. Branch delay slots are simulated.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 on successful completion. Error code otherwise.

      • flushpipeline

        public int flushpipeline()
        Clear all pipeline stages, in-flight instructions are discarded.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 on completion.

      • isStalled

        public boolean isStalled()
        Return whether the CPU is stalled
        Returns:
        boolean that indicates whether the CPU is stalled

        Returns:
        Flags in long type
